titles.title: We Are The Clay And Thou Our Potter

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Is there none that calls upon Thy name O Lord,
Is there none that stirs himself to take ahold of Thee,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou hast hid Thyself from us and thus consumed us,
Because of our iniquity.
But now O Lord,
Thou art our Father.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are the clay and Thou our potter,
We are the work of Thy holy hands,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be not wroth
Remember not our sins,
Behold and see
We are Thy people,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Doubtless Lord Thou art our Father,
Thou O Lord art our Father.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
We are they that call upon Thy name O Lord,
We are they that stir ourselves to take ahold of Thee,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
O Lord, hide us in Thyself and thus consume us,
Both now and through eternity.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
For Thou O Lord,
Thou art our Father.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Thou O Lord
Our Redeemer,
Thy name Is
From ever lasting.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
We are Thine, called by Thy holy name.
Forget the old, create a new thing.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Make us Lord a rejoicing,
Make us Lord to be Thy joy.
